channel.title: D plate glitches through my firecape
channel.description: here is the problem [img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo342/tehccftw/DplateGlitchfirecape.jpg[/img] what do i need to do to fix it?

item.title: D plate glitches through my firecape
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:4, topic:261170”][quote author=qw3rty link=topic=344895.msg2664115#msg2664115 date=1234412821]
lol elite you must be the most utterly stupid person ive ever heard. that comment was dumber than a comment a talking rock (if there were any) would make…
[/quote]

Yes but:

or the dpl8 is bad codeing…

There is a small amount of sense in that, i’m guessing this is the dragon plate i released? (As it’s the only one i’ve seen fully animating)

If that’s the case, i used a shortcut to animating back then when i released it, therefore it is not animated ‘perfectly’.[/quote]
at the bottom of the d plate on my server, it shows the outfit.

Read full topic
item.source: D plate glitches through my firecape

item.title: D plate glitches through my firecape
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

qw3rty:

lol elite you must be the most utterly stupid person ive ever heard. that comment was dumber than a comment a talking rock (if there were any) would make…

Yes but:

Elite Jamie:

or the dpl8 is bad codeing…

There is a small amount of sense in that, i’m guessing this is the dragon plate i released? (As it’s the only one i’ve seen fully animating)

If that’s the case, i used a shortcut to animating back then when i released it, therefore it is not animated ‘perfectly’.
